The connection will be lost for a few minutes.

ui.watchdog.rtsp.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use start, stop, or restart_service
ui.watchdog.wifi.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use start or stop
ui.recordings.access_denied_outside_dir: Access denied: path outside recording directory
ui.recordings.confirm_delete_count: Are you sure you want to delete {count} file(s)?
ui.recordings.play_error_hint: TS format - Download to play locally
ui.recordings.confirm_delete_locked:
The file "{filename}" is locked.

Delete it anyway?
ui.recordings.confirm_delete_file: Are you sure you want to delete "{filename}"?
ui.home.welcome_subtitle: Management interface for Raspberry Pi camera
ui.rtsp.auth_help: Credentials are shared between RTSP and ONVIF (WS-Security). If both user and password are set, authentication is required to access the RTSP stream. Leave empty for unauthenticated access.
ui.rtsp.auth.enabled:
Authentication enabled - User "{user}" will be required to access the RTSP stream.
URL: rtsp://{user}:****@IP:PORT/PATH
ui.rtsp.auth.partial: Authentication incomplete - Please provide both user AND password to enable authentication.
ui.rtsp.auth.disabled: Authentication disabled - The RTSP stream is accessible without a password. Set a user and password to secure access.
ui.rtsp.settings_help: Control the RTSP video stream and recording independently of the camera
ui.video.csi_overlay_warning_text: Date/time is not supported in libcamera mode. Disable it or switch back to software mode.
ui.rtsp.apply_settings_help: Saves and restarts the RTSP service with the new settings
ui.onvif.title: ONVIF service
ui.onvif.help: ONVIF enables automatic discovery of the camera by NVRs and compatible software (Synology Surveillance Station, Blue Iris, etc.).
ui.onvif.url_help: Use this URL to add the camera in your NVR/ONVIF software.
ui.onvif.video_help: The video settings reported to ONVIF clients are automatically synchronized with the Video tab settings.
ui.onvif.video_hint: Change these values in the Video tab, then restart the ONVIF service.
ui.onvif.camera_name_hint: Name automatically retrieved from Meeting API (product_serial)
ui.onvif.username_help: Used if RTSP credentials are empty
ui.onvif.password_help: ONVIF WS-Security (ignored if RTSP auth is set)
ui.onvif.rtsp_port_help: RTSP port advertised to ONVIF clients
ui.onvif.rtsp_path_help: RTSP path advertised to ONVIF clients
ui.onvif.shared_credentials_help: If RTSP credentials are defined, they are automatically used for ONVIF (WS-Security). Otherwise, you can define them above.
ui.onvif.help_what_text: ONVIF is a standard that allows IP cameras to be detected and configured automatically by video surveillance software.
ui.onvif.help_sw_onvif_profile_s: And any software compatible with ONVIF Profile S
ui.video.preview_help: View the camera stream in real time
ui.video.device_section_help: Select the video source first (USB or CSI camera)
ui.video.device_legacy_help: Legacy field used by some scripts - keep the same as VIDEO_DEVICE
ui.video.camera_type_help: Select the camera type (restart required to apply)
ui.video.csi_enable_help: Allow or block the CSI camera
ui.video.usb_enable_help: Allow or block the USB camera
ui.video.camera_type_auto_only: Used only when camera type is set to Auto
ui.video.resolution_help: Select a resolution supported by your camera
ui.video.manual_mode_help: Enable to enter a custom resolution
ui.video.camera_controls_help: Adjust camera settings in real time
ui.video.autofocus_help: Disable to avoid mechanical noise. "Focus" button = one-time focus then lock.
ui.video.advanced_controls_help: All available controls for this camera
ui.video.csi_controls_notice: CSI/PiCam cameras use libcamera and do not support advanced v4l2 controls. Image settings must be configured via libcamera parameters.
ui.video.restart_stream_title: Restart the stream if changes are not visible
ui.video.profiles_help: Automatically apply settings based on time
ui.video.profiles_scheduler_help: Enable automatic profile changes based on defined schedules
ui.video.profiles_file_help: Path to the JSON file containing camera profiles
ui.audio.capture_help: Auto detects if a USB microphone is connected
ui.recording.note_body: Local recording via the RTSP server is not supported with test-launch.
ui.recording.note_command_intro: To record, use an external command:
ui.recording.enable_help: Internal recording is disabled for RTSP stream stability
ui.recording.segment_help: Duration of each file in seconds (default: 300 = 5 min)
ui.recording.min_free_help: Free disk space to keep. Old recordings will be deleted to respect this limit. 0 = no limit.
ui.recording.max_disk_help: 0 = no limit. If set, total space used by recordings is capped.
ui.files.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support video playback.
ui.network.title: Network configuration
ui.network.interfaces_priority_help: Drag and drop to reorder priority. The top interface will be used first if available.
ui.network.dns_help: Separate multiple DNS entries with commas
ui.network.ethernet_priority_help: If enabled, WiFi on wlan0 is automatically disabled when Ethernet is connected, unless you manually force WiFi on.
ui.network.wifi_override_help: When enabled, WiFi stays active even if Ethernet is connected
ui.network.ap_help: Turns wlan0 into a WiFi access point for direct connection from a smartphone/PC. Settings are managed by Meeting.
ui.network.ap_warning_text: Access Point mode uses wlan0, which disables hardware WiFi failover. However, wlan1 (USB dongle) remains available for network failover to another WiFi.
ui.network.wifi.cloned_and_connected: Cloned WiFi config from {source} and connected {interface}
ui.network.wifi.cloned_pending: Cloned WiFi config from {source}, connection pending
ui.network.wifi.no_connected_interface: No connected WiFi interface found to clone from
ui.network.failover_help: Two levels of failover: Hardware (USB dongle removed → use built-in WiFi) and Network (primary AP unavailable → use backup network).
ui.network.failover_hw_help: Automatic switching between physical WiFi dongles. The primary dongle is used if present, otherwise the secondary takes over.
ui.network.failover_hw_enable_help: If disabled, only the primary interface will be used
ui.network.secondary_interface_help: Fallback if the primary is absent
ui.network.failover_network_help: Automatic switching between two WiFi networks. The primary network is used if available, otherwise the secondary.
ui.network.failover_network_enable_help: If disabled, only the primary network will be used
ui.network.failover.already_in_progress: Failover already in progress by another worker
ui.network.failover.manual_override: Manual override enabled - all interfaces managed manually
ui.network.failover_ip_help: This IP configuration will be applied regardless of the active interface or network.
ui.system.power_help: Save power by disabling unused components. Changes persist after reboot.
ui.system.led_csi_help: Red LED on the Pi Camera module
ui.system.led_ethernet_help: Link/Activity LEDs for the RJ45 port
ui.system.led_ethernet_unavailable: Not controllable on {model} (LEDs managed by PHY)
ui.system.tty1_help: Login on HDMI screen (unused if headless)
ui.system.power_note: Changes will take effect after the next system reboot.
ui.system.gpu_memory_help: Memory allocation for the GPU. More GPU memory = better video performance but less RAM available.
ui.system.ntp_help: Configure the NTP server to synchronize system time.
ui.system.update.invalid_archive: Update file is not a valid tar archive
ui.system.backup.invalid_archive: Backup file is not a valid tar archive
ui.system.snmp.host_required: SNMP host required when SNMP is enabled
ui.system.snmp.udp_send_failed: DNS resolution OK but UDP send failed
ui.system.rtc_help: Use the RTC clock to keep time without network.
ui.system.reboot_schedule_help: Schedule an automatic reboot on a timetable.
ui.updates.repo_help: Update the system from the GitHub repo.
ui.updates.confirm_repo_update: Apply the update from the repo?
ui.updates.missing_dependencies: Missing dependencies detected: automatic install + reboot required.
ui.updates.confirm_file_update: Apply the update from this file?
ui.backup.title: Backup / Restore
ui.backup.help: Backup and restore local configuration (optional logs).
ui.status.label: Status
ui.backup.confirm_restore:
Restore configuration from this backup?

The Raspberry Pi will reboot.
ui.meeting.header: Meeting API integration - centralized IoT management
ui.meeting.configure_hint: Configure the settings below to enable integration
ui.meeting.provisioning_help: Enter your Meeting credentials to provision this device. This operation consumes a token and locks configuration.
ui.actions.title: Actions
ui.meeting.device_info_hint: Click "Device info" to load data from Meeting
ui.meeting.tunnels_help: Request a reverse tunnel to access the device from outside
ui.meeting.master_reset_warning: This action will reset the Meeting configuration.
ui.meeting.master_reset_hostname_note: The device hostname will not be changed.
ui.advanced.low_latency_help: Optimize for minimal RTSP stream latency
ui.logs.hint: Click "Refresh" to load logs or "Live logs" for streaming...
ui.logs.clean_confirm:
Do you really want to clean the log files on the server?

This action will:
- Truncate the main log file (keep last 100 lines)
- Delete GStreamer logs
- Delete old log files (> 7 days)
- Clear journald cache
ui.debug.warning: Advanced maintenance area. These operations may take several minutes and reboot the system.
ui.debug.access_required: This feature requires the "vnc" or "debug" service to be declared in Meeting.
ui.debug.meeting_local_help: These settings drive the local service (heartbeat). Leave the token empty to avoid changing it.
ui.debug.token_update_help: The token is only updated if this field is filled
ui.debug.rtc_help: Status and diagnostics for the hardware clock (RTC).
ui.debug.firmware.use_apt_title: initramfs detected - use apt upgrade below
ui.debug.firmware.confirm_update:
Update the firmware?

A reboot will be required after the update.
ui.debug.firmware.confirm_experimental:
WARNING: rpi-update installs an EXPERIMENTAL firmware!

This can cause system instability.
Use only if you know what you're doing.

Continue?
ui.debug.firmware.downloading:
Downloading and installing firmware...
This may take a few minutes, please wait...
ui.debug.firmware.initramfs_output:
This system uses initramfs, incompatible with rpi-update.
Use "apt upgrade" for kernel and firmware updates.
ui.debug.firmware.use_apt_message: Use apt upgrade for updates (initramfs detected)
ui.debug.firmware.install_tools: Install rpi-update or rpi-eeprom-update depending on your Pi model.
ui.debug.firmware.experimental_warning: rpi-update installs experimental firmware. Use with caution.
ui.debug.apt_update_help: Refreshes the list of available packages from repositories. Does not modify installed packages.
ui.debug.apt_update.running_output:
Refreshing package lists...
This may take a few minutes...
ui.debug.apt_update.timeout: Timeout: apt update took too long (>5 min)
ui.debug.apt_upgrade_help: Installs available updates for all packages. May take several minutes.
ui.debug.apt_upgrade_details: Run "apt update" first to check for updates
ui.debug.apt_upgrade.all_up_to_date: All packages are up to date
ui.debug.apt_upgrade.confirm:
Update all packages?

This operation may take several minutes.
ui.debug.apt_upgrade.running_output:
Installing updates...
This may take a few minutes, please wait...
ui.debug.apt_upgrade.timeout: Timeout: apt upgrade took too long (>30 min)
ui.debug.scheduler_help: Schedule automatic apt update and apt upgrade. Logs available in /var/log/rpi-cam/apt-autoupdate.log
ui.debug.terminal_help: Secure command console. Only certain system commands are allowed.
ui.debug.terminal_welcome: Welcome to the RTSP Recorder web terminal.
ui.debug.terminal.note_sudo: Note: Use "sudo" before a command for root privileges.
ui.system.reboot_help: Restarts the Raspberry Pi. Required after some updates (firmware, kernel).
ui.profile.capture_help: Click "Capture" to save current camera settings into this profile
ui.onvif.name_hint_from_meeting: Name retrieved automatically from Meeting API (product_serial)
ui.onvif.name_hint_default: Meeting API not configured - default name used
ui.meeting.device_not_authorized: Device not authorized. Contact the Meeting administrator.
ui.meeting.token_unavailable: No token available. Contact the Meeting administrator.
ui.meeting.reset_done_hostname_preserved: Meeting configuration reset. The hostname remains unchanged.
ui.meeting.provision_success: Device provisioned successfully! Token consumed, {tokens_left} remaining.
ui.meeting.credentials_required: api_url, device_key and token_code are required
ui.meeting.status.enter_credentials: Enter your credentials to provision this device
ui.meeting.validation.provision_hint: Click "Provision device" to continue. This operation consumes 1 token.
ui.meeting.validation.not_authorized: This device is not authorized in Meeting.
ui.meeting.provision.confirm:
Are you sure you want to provision this device?

This action will:
- Consume 1 provisioning token
- Change the device hostname
- Lock the Meeting configuration
ui.meeting.provision.access_hint: After a few seconds, you can access the interface at:

ui.preview.camera_unavailable_hint: Check that the camera is connected
ui.camera.controls_none: No controls available for this camera
ui.camera.restart_stream_confirm: Restart the RTSP stream? Connected clients will be disconnected.
ui.camera.stream_restarted: Stream restarted - settings are now active
ui.camera.csi_picamera2_missing_hint: To control CSI camera settings, install Picamera2:

ui.camera.csi_in_use_hint: The CSI camera is currently used by the RTSP stream.
ui.camera.csi_stop_stream_confirm:
Stop the RTSP stream to configure the camera?
Connected clients will be disconnected.
ui.camera.csi.starting_retry: CSI server is starting. Try again in a few seconds.
ui.camera.csi.picamera2_not_installed: Picamera2 not installed. Run: sudo apt install python3-picamera2
ui.camera.csi.not_detected: No CSI camera detected. Check the ribbon cable connection.
ui.camera.csi.busy_stop_stream_restart: Camera busy with RTSP stream. Stop the stream to change settings, then restart it.
ui.camera.csi.busy_stop_stream: Camera busy with RTSP stream. Stop the stream to change settings.
ui.camera.csi.control_saved_streaming: Control {name} saved. NOTE: CSI server is streaming; changes apply on next server restart.
ui.camera.csi.server_running: CSI server running - controls via IPC
ui.camera.auto_controls_none: No auto controls could be set
ui.camera.csi_reset_confirm: Reset all CSI settings to default values?
ui.camera.csi.control.colour_gains.label: Color gains (R/B)
ui.camera.csi.control.brightness.label: Brightness
ui.camera.csi.control.contrast.label: Contrast

ui.camera.csi.control.sharpness.label: Sharpness
ui.camera.csi.control.ae_enable.label: Auto exposure
ui.camera.csi.control.awb_enable.label: Auto white balance
ui.camera.csi.control.awb_mode.label: AWB mode
ui.camera.csi.control.hdr_mode.label: HDR mode
ui.camera.csi.control.scaler_crop.label: Crop region
ui.camera.csi.control.sync_mode.label: Sync mode
ui.camera.csi.control.sync_frames.label: Sync frames
ui.camera.advanced.live_apply_notice: Changes are applied in real time to the video stream
ui.camera.profile.none_configured_hint: Create profiles to automate day/night settings.
ui.camera.profile.no_settings: No settings saved in this profile.
ui.camera.profile.capture_confirm:
Capture current settings into profile "{profile}"?
This will replace existing settings.
ui.camera.profile.ghost_fix_confirm:
Apply ghost-fix to profile "{profile}"?
This disables AE/AWB and centers brightness.
ui.network.static_required: Please fill the IP address and gateway
ui.network.ip.static_required: Please enter a static IP address
ui.network.ip.dhcp_saved: DHCP mode saved. NetworkManager manages IP automatically.
ui.network.ap.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
ui.network.ap.missing_config: Missing AP configuration. Check that Meeting is provisioned.
ui.network.ap.missing_password: Missing AP password. Check that Meeting is provisioned.
